name: Tasnuva Mila
reviews: Thanks a lot Leo for my wedding pictures You people tried your best to make my pictures more special. leo is a great person and he took our photo very carefully and took our best remember moments

name: Riya Islam
reviews: I highly recommend Leo studio. He covered all our wedding events. The photos came out great and on time as promised.

name: Alex john
reviews: Leo studio covered my engagement ceremony! And the way he took care of it was beyond my expectations and imagination.
